title: Splitbus Nation 2014, July 25, 26 and 27 Wachtebeke Belgium

posts.content:
"Splitbus Nation" 2014 will be held on the weekend of July 25, 26 and 27, 2014! This split screen van only event returns to the beautiful Domain "Puyenbroeck" in Wachtebeke (Belgium) for the fourth time. This biennial event is entirely dedicated to the Volkswagen T1 buses. Our main sponsor BBT and all other sponsors make it possible to put down another great event. In the past two editions hundreds of owners of split buses from France, Germany, Netherlands, England and Scotland made a visit to this meeting.

As an organization we offer a varied program with a tour and barbecue on Saturday. On Sunday a meeting with many exhibitors with all VW-related issues such as parts, pinstriping, T-shirts, miniatures and some fun activities. The children are not forgotten with a bouncy castle, face painting and children's bus painting. The domain Puyenbroeck features a spacious site with all necessary facilities (toilets, showers and electricity connection). In addition, the park also offers a range of leisure and sports facilities for young and old as an Olympic swimming pool, mini golf, playgrounds for the kids and you can always visit the restaurant "The 4 Seasons" on the domain.

We look forward to welcoming you and wish you a warm welcome to Splitbus Nation 2014.

http://splitbusnation.be
See you there

Booking is open!
For those who want to camp Thursday and Sunday be aware of the fact that these spots are limited!

http://splitbusnation.be/index.php/en/web-store.html
Looking forward to this show, still need to finish getting the engine running sweet and be able to select gears in the bus but should all be sorted before we leave early Friday morning for Belgium

Gears sorted but metal brake line burst tonight so more work tomorrow night now.

We will get to Belgium!!!
